page.title: 02DAILY LIFE IN FLAX BOURTON
page.content: { {Family life in Flax Bourton An average day would begin at 7,00am.Dad gets up and makes a cup of tea and wakes the family.Everyone gets dressed,washed and has breakfast.Dad goes to work at 8.00am the children go to school.They do their lessons have lunch,and go back for afternoon school.Meanwhile Mum does the housework.The children come home and watch television,Dad comes home and they have tea. then they go outside and play. At 8.30pm the children go to bed.Mum and Dad .They read the paper and go to bed at 11.30pm.
